thread.title: Bloodhound to be unveiled to the nation | West Country (E)
thread.title_full: Bloodhound to be unveiled to the nation | West Country (E) - ITV News

author: itv.com
title: Bloodhound to be unveiled to the nation | West Country (E)
text:
The Bloodhound will be unveiled in London today Credit: Flock London The supersonic car known as the Bloodhound will be unveiled today.
The Bristol-built vehicle is making its debut in London, before going on public display.
The much-anticipated racer is aiming to break world records by reaching speeds of more than 1,000 miles per hour.
Last updated Thu 24 Sep 2015 Read more 2 updates Supersonic Bloodhound making its debut Technology Bloodhound Bristol
